gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 97, Hornets 89
gameRecap.excerpt: Joel Embiid extends his 30+ point game streak to 20 as the 76ers defeat the Hornets, 97-89. Embiid recorded 33 points, 10 rebounds and five assists for the 76ers, while Tobias Harris added 21 points, five rebounds and six assists in the victory. Miles Bridges tallied 25 points (5-10 3pt. FG) and 11 rebounds for the Hornets in the losing effort. The 76ers win their fifth consecutive game as they improve to 28-13 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 9-31.
